content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Different ways to begin granting access There are different ways to begin granting Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection access to services: Go to Email and Collaboration Security Operations → Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection → Dashboard → Service Status, click Grant Access in the Action column for a service. Go to Email and Collaboration Security Operations → Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection → Administration → Service Account, click Add, hover over the organization for which you need to grant access to services, and select a service from the list that appears. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Different ways to begin granting access
